Welcome to Sphinx Hellow word's documentation!
==============================================

Welcome to the complete beginner's guide to Sphinx!
If you are looking for a complete comprehensive guide to the sphinx documentation software, then you have come to the right place.

Who is this course for?
You dont need to know anything about Sphinx to begin this course, this is completely beginner-friendly! Even if you have some 
subtitling experience, you will be sure to find this guide useful.

If you are completely new to Sphinx, :ref: "install sphinx first <settingup>" to start learning.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:
   
   beforeyoubegin
